question: Select the VPC Peering statement below that is NOT true
ans1: A. VPC peering supports transitive peering relationships for IPv6 traffic but not IPv4
ans2: B. VPC peering can be performed between VPCs in different AWS accounts in the same region
ans3: C. TCP connections can be performed between peered VPCs
ans4: D. UDP connections can be performed between peered VPCs

question: Fill in the blanks: One of the basic characteristics of security groups for your VPC is that you ______ .
ans1: A. can specify allow rules  but not deny rules
ans2: B. can specify deny rules  but not allow rules
ans3: C. can specify allow rules as well as deny rules
ans4: D. can neither specify allow rules nor deny rules

question: When an AWS Config rule is triggered a JSON object known as an AWS Config Event is created. This object contains another JSON string in its _____ parameter which describes the event that triggered the rule.

When an AWS Config rule is triggered a JSON object known as an AWS Config Event is created. This object contains a(n) ______ attribute  which is a JSONformatted set of key/value pairs the receiving AWS Lambda function processes as part of its evaluation logic.
You can use the ______ page of the AWS Config console to look up resources that AWS Config has discovered  including deleted resources and resources that are not currently being recorded.
explanation: Reference: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/config/latest/developerguide/looking-up-discovered-resources.html Your Partner of IT Exam visit - https://www.exambible.com  gWe recommend you to try the PREMIUM AWS-Certified-Advanced-Networking-Specialty Dumps From Exambible https://www.exambible.com/AWS-Certified-Advanced-Networking-Specialty-exam/ (76 Q&As)

question: Which element of AWS Config can be used to help maintain internal and external compliance controls?
AWS Config flags a resource as ______ if a resource violates any conditions of an AWS Config rule that it evaluates on the resource in question.
Each custom AWS Config rule you create must be associated with a(n) AWS _____   which contains the logic that evaluates whether your AWS resources comply with the rule.
You can use the _____ command of the AWS Config service CLI to see the compliance state of each of your rules.

A user is having data generated randomly based on a certain event. The user wants to upload that data to CloudWatch. It may happen that event may not have data generated for some period due to randomness. Which of the below mentioned options is a recommended option for this case?
ans1: A. For the period when there is no data  the user should not send the data at all
ans2: B. The user must upload the data to CloudWatch as having no data for some period will cause an error at CloudWatch monitoring
ans3: C. For the period when there is no data the user should send the value as 0
ans4: D. For the period when there is no data the user should send a blank value

question: A user is running a batch process on EBS backed EC2 instances. The batch process launches few EC2 instances to process hadoop Map reduce jobs which can run between 50 – 600 minutes or sometimes for even more time. The user wants a configuration that can terminate the instance only when the process is completed. How can the user configure this with CloudWatch? Your Partner of IT Exam visit - https://www.exambible.com  gWe recommend you to try the PREMIUM AWS-Certified-Advanced-Networking-Specialty Dumps From Exambible https://www.exambible.com/AWS-Certified-Advanced-Networking-Specialty-exam/ (76 Q&As)
ans1: A. Configure a job which terminates all instances after 600 minutes
ans2: B. It is not possible to terminate instances automatically
ans3: C. Set up the CloudWatch with Auto Scaling to terminate all the instances
ans4: D. Configure the CloudWatch action to terminate the instance when the CPU utilization falls below 5%
